title: Chestnut and lentil roast
directions: Cover the chestnuts with cold water and bring to the boilfor 10 minutes, then drain. Peel them when cool enough to handle and cut into small pieces.
Simmer the lentils in salted water for 15-20 minutes until slightly tender, then drain.

Heat the oil and gently fry the onion, garlic and spices. Add the cooked chestnuts and lentils to the pan, stir well and remove from the heat. Mix in the porridge oats and herbs, then season to taste. Add the stock and mix well.
Place the mixture firmly in a non-stick or oiled loaf tin or similar. Bake for about 40 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool slightly before serving.
ingredients: ½ tsp ground or mixed spice
